result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

chargeModifiers.descr: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lequan Jamarie Jeff

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Lequan Jamarie Jeff in court, in custody.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Lequan Jamarie Jeff. Attorney Tyler Rubenzer in court for State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for status conference. Court waived defendant's appearance.
Discussion held. Defendant has felony matters (22CF2683 & 22CF2458) in Branch 45 and will be seeking a global offer and request the court to authorize transfer.
Court authorizes transfer to Branch 45 for purposes of a global resolution, if accepted.   
Court ordered matter adjourned back to Branch 13. 
Parties are advised that effective 10/31/2022, pursuant to Chief Judge Directive 22-17, this case will be reassigned to Branch 37, Judge Dee in Room 515 of the Courthouse.
Status conference scheduled for December 8, 2022 at 09:00 am.
CORRECTION: Judge Konkol presided over Branch 13 on August 31st, 2022

Defendant Lequan Jamarie Jeff not in court, in custody.  Attorney Haley E Wentz in court for Lequan Jamarie Jeff.  Prosecuting attorney Nate Kristian McClure in court for the State of Wisconsin. 
Case in court for a status conference. Defense has not yet received an offer. Defendant has two felony matters. One in Branch 45 and one in Branch 11. Defense will be seeking a global offer and request the court to authorize transfer to BOTH branches, as Defense does not know where this case may go. 
Court authorizes transfer to Branch 45 AND 11 for purposes of a global resolution, if accepted.   
Case adjourned.
Status conference scheduled for October 25, 2022 at 02:00 pm.

Attorney Amanda Poznanski for Haley E Wentz in court, defendant Lequan Jamarie Jeff not in court, in custody.  Thomas Hasle appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Attorney appeared by video means.
Case in court for pretrial conference. Defense counsel has received discovery and has not received an offer from the state.  
Defense counsel informed the Court that the defendant has two pending felony matters waiting appointment and may be a global resolution.
Defense requests status date to determine case posture. Case adjourned to Branch 37.
All parties are advised effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to a Branch of RESERVE JUDGES.  Status conference scheduled for August 31, 2022 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services DISCHARGE Report received and filed.
Signed and filed, No Contact Order.  Defendant to have no contact with DeIvory A.; John B.R.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 3.  Court advised Defendant to update Justice Point with any changes in his address or phone number.  Defendant advised if released from custody it is a requirement to attend all future court proceedings.  Failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping, a warrant issued or high cash bail.

Defendant Lequan Jamarie Jeff in court with attorney Haley E Wentz.  Defendant Lequan Jamarie Jeff in custody.  Jessica Ann Behling appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Lequan Jamarie Jeff appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Dee, Branch 37.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND QUALIFIES FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION.  This hearing may be streamed live on Dacast at the Court's discretion:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/3c595ccd-39e3-09d4-8db1-82162d766d4f  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
